law.catch_line: Credit Needs Of Local Communities; Assessment Of Banks; Regulations; Application For Establishment Of Domestic Branch; Examination; Alternative Community Reinvestment Examination Procedure

text.section: the assessment factors utilized to determine the bank’s descriptive rating;
the commissioner’s conclusions with respect to each such assessment factor;
a discussion of the facts supporting such conclusions; and
the bank’s descriptive rating and the basis therefor.
outstanding record of performance in meeting its community credit needs;
high satisfactory record of performance in meeting its community credit needs;
satisfactory record of performance in meeting its community credit needs;
needs to improve record of performance in meeting its community credit needs; or
substantial noncompliance in meeting its community credit needs.
